CHAT.comment: DEPARTMENT OF THE INTERIOR AND BUREAU OF INDIAN AFFAIRS, Petitioners v. KLAMATH WATER USERS PROTECTIVE ASSOCIATION
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MALCOLM L. STEWART ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ANDREW M. HITCHINGS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF MALCOLM L. STEWART ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:49 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
